title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for 2 reds, 2 purples and black applied over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist by immersion. Yellow applied by brush.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 56 x 22 cm (22 1/16 x 8 11/16 in.)
description: Fragment from a larger panel. Design of flowers springing from decorative shapes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for 2 reds, 2 purples and black applied over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist by immersion. Yellow applied by brush.. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-10.
